author: jimmygchen
content:
Thanks for bringing this up <@531934490826768418>. I was also hoping to fix issues first before we move on, but things outside the client implementations are moving fast:
 - latest spec tests release already cover this change, and also has PeerDAS in Fulu i think. We're working on getting electra tests updated to `alpha10` as well, so we'll need these passing.
- `ethereum-package` no longer support `eip7594_fork` so we cannot use the latest version of it to test

We don't even have Fulu hard fork set up in Lighthouse yet, so it's getting a bit hard to test and interop with everyone else, so I think we might have to focus on the new features and fix issues later.

Three of the linked issues have been resolved now, so I'll keep working on it - I'm probably 80% through implementation - still need to go through some details like mapping custody groups to subnets, but haven't discovered anything major.
